hero_p: Useful insider information for your stay at Aura Adriatica Apartments.

sections.title: Parking
sections.content: There are three private parking spaces in front of each apartment, all available and reserved for you.

sections.title: Secure Digital Key
sections.content: The apartments have a secure digital lock with a PIN. Before arrival, we will send you the PIN via WhatsApp, SMS, or email.

sections.title: Wi-Fi Information

sections.title: Guest Registration
sections.content: All guests must be registered according to Croatian law. Please fill in details via Guest Registration Form.

sections.title: Waste Disposal
sections.content:
Two bins: one for mixed waste and one for plastic (in the parking area).
Key: Onyx — shelf to the right of the entrance door; Olive — rightmost drawer in the kitchen island.
